_header: Matthew here in his speaking / Telleth us full sweet tiding
_description: Gospel, In oce. Epiphanie, in one MS of the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
MAtheu here in his spekyngeTelleþ vs ful swete
                    tiþynge…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…To his Blisse he vs dihtÞat Made alle þing wiþ
                    his miht Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Venit Ihesu A Galilea in Iordanem (f. 174rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
